name: powerpoint-add-in-commands
title: Create a PowerPoint add-in with command buttons
shortDescription: Create a PowerPoint add-in with command buttons.
longDescription: Learn how to build an Office Add-in that has a command button to show the task pane and a menu dropdown button that shows the task pane or gets data.

thumbnails.alt: PowerPoint ribbon with Home tab selected and two buttons for the sample that show the task pane or show a dropdown menu.

references.name: Add-in commands
references.description: Add-in commands are UI elements that extend the Office UI and start actions in your add-in.
